## load libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

## load data

```{r}
data <- read_csv("D:/Daten/Bildung/HS Mannheim/BA/bachelors-thesis/processed_data/dea_results.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
```



## years vs effiviency

```{r}
data %>%
  filter(continent == "Europe") %>%
  ggplot(aes(year, efficiencies))+
  geom_point(aes(
    color=country
  ))
```
## Efficnienies per continent (all years)

```{r}
data %>%
  # filter(continent == "Africa") %>%
  ggplot(aes(continent, efficiencies))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  geom_jitter(width = 0.1,
              alpha = 0.5,
              aes(
                color=year
              ))
```


```{r}

data %>%
  filter(year==1992) %>%
  filter(efficiencies==1) %>%
  mean(income)

```
